column4: Strange thing happening. If I use a media player to play music (Rythmbox) and then go into firefox and try to listen to audio, nothing comes out without a reboot. Is it just me, or....
have you attempted to close Rythmbox before opening Firefox and trying to listen to audio?
afaik, only one app can use audio output at any given time.
I can't remember if I've done it in that order. I just had rythmbox open, and, with it open tried to listen to something on myspace. It still wouldn't work even after closing the music player
